text: Gustavo Marmentini dos Santos (born 8 March 1994) is a Brazilian professional footballer who plays for Hapoel Hadera, on loan from Atlético Paranaense, as an attacking midfielder. ==Career== Born in Cascavel, Paraná, Marmentini graduated from Atlético Paranaense's youth system, and was promoted to the main squad in June 2014.Atlético-PR reforça grupo principal com trio formado nas categorias de base (Atlético-PR bolsters main squad with trio of youth graduates); Globo Esporte, 24 June 2014 On 12 August he was loaned to Delhi Dynamos FC.Em parceria, Atlético-PR empresta quinteto para atuar na Liga Indiana (In a partnership, Atlético-PR loans five to play in Indian League); Globo Esporte, 12 August 2014 On 14 October Marmentini made his professional debut, coming on as a late substitute in a 0–0 home draw against FC Pune City.FC Pune City hold Delhi Dynamos to goalless draw; Indian Super League, 14 October 2014 On the 25th he scored his first goal, the last of a 4–1 home routing over Chennaiyin FC.Delhi Dynamos FC secure first win, beat Chennaiyin FC 4-1; Indian Super League, 25 October 2014 On 1 July 2015 it was announced that Marmentini would be retained by the club to participate in the 2015 Indian Super League. On 7 July 2018, Marmentini was announced as a new signing for Alashkert. On 26 July 2020 signed in the Israeli Premier League club Hapoel Hadera. ==References== ==External links== *Atlético-PR official profile *ISL profile * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:People from Cascavel Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Club Athletico Paranaense players Category:Odisha FC players Category:Al-Ittihad Kalba SC players Category:FC Alashkert players Category:Hapoel Hadera F.C. players Category:UAE First Division League players Category:Israeli Premier League players Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in India Category:Expatriate footballers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Expatriate footballers in Armenia Category:Expatriate footballers in Israel Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in India Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United Arab Emirates Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Armenia Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Israel
title: Gustavo Marmentini
